title: need imaging tool for imaging to and from USB bootable partitions

forumNotes.author: Zoso
forumNotes.content:
can someone tell me what imaging tool (preferable freeware) to use for imaging a USB2.0 HDD primary partition that has w7 and can restore the image to a different USB (both HDD and Flash)?  

I have Acronis True Image Home 11, it will image a USB HDD OK but wont let me restore the image to a USB drive.  

I would like to image from USB2.0 HDD first primary partition that is active NTFS W7 and be able to restore that image to any USB drive and any partition (including logical ones)   

also that will automatically adjust restoration to different sized partitions.  

thanks

forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
**VHD_W7_Compact.exe** has option Full Copy Version that can be used as Imaging Tool and will Create Win7- VHD.

**IMG_XP_Restore.exe**can be used to Restore Win7- VHD to primary partition of USB or HDD

See IMG_XP package [http://reboot.pro/to...-and-windows-7/](http://reboot.pro/topic/9830-universal-hdd-image-files-for-xp-and-windows-7/ "") Or [http://www.911cd.net...showtopic=23553](http://www.911cd.net/forums//index.php?showtopic=23553 "External link")
